metadata.title: CVE-2023-38572 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iOS15.7.8 and iPadOS 15.7.8, iOS 16.6 and iPadOS 16.6, tvOS 16.6, macOSVentura 13.5, Safari 16.6, watchOS 9.6. A website may be able to bypassSame Origin Policy.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-38572` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.40.5-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.40.5-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.40.5-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.40.5-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.40.5-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.40.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.40.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.40.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.5-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.40.5-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.40.5-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.40.5-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.40.5-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.40.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.40.5-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
